author: sct
title: One of three best duplo sets available
review:
I'd say there are always three best duplo sets: a figures/animal set, currently it's Around the World - 10805, train set (trains are cool - period), either Steam Train - 10874 or Cargo Train - 10875, and there's the set with the most and best building bricks. And 10929 Modular Playhouse is currently that set.

5 large plates and more

This set has 5 large duplo 6x12 plates, 3 white and 2 brick yellow. From my experience these are the main construction blocks for all duplo buildings and I have always had too few, as there arent that many sets that have them, and even if they do, it's just 1 or 2. There's lots of doors, windows, furniture which are very useful when kids build their own, smaller buildings.

Building experience

This set can be built in three ways, all of them are in the book with the set. It's a rather complex duplo set, my 2.5yo couldn't build it alone, but with my help he did have fun building it. It's duplo, there's virtually no complexity in it for an AFOL, so I really can't say much more.

A starter set

This would be a great starter set for KFOLs. It has 5 figures, some "equipment" (guitar, toilet, bed - see the inventory for details). One can play family with this set, build various buildings or combine both. Overall there's a good balance of construction bricks and play-bricks.

For us, the house was dismantled after a day and became a skyscraper, then a large hotel, then there were multiple stations at a train track, there was much more in the meantime, and now I have some shops set up by my kids. We have some more bricks from various sets, but the beforementioned large plates were a great and very needed addition to our collection. I'm considering buing a second set just for the blocks.

author: HomeOnTheRange
title: Great starter set, many cool details
review:
Our family has enjoyed this set a lot.  If you were going to start with one Duplo set, I would recommend this because of the functionality and playability.  The instructions give three different styles of house one can build.  However, we use the pieces to build whatever our imagination guides.  With 5 large baseplates (3 white, 2 tan) and many white bricks (mostly 2x2 and 2x4), our 3 yo was able to build the most fantastic structures.  She is almost 6yo now, and we still play with the pieces from the set on a weekly basis.  There are multiple large windows (that can also double as doors) that are very modern looking in white but also include one a pale butter yellow (nicer than what appears in the picture here) and lilac (lighter purple than what looks like in the picture).  It has two of the nice Duplo smooth faux wood counter/table tops, a fridge and oven, two sink pieces and a full bathroom set (toilet with lid that lifts, tub and sink).  There is a chest with one drawer (in the photo, the chest is pink on the top level and the drawer is white in the bathroom window.  There are multiple towels and blankets and one rug (see underneath the rocking horse).  The sofa pieces (see 2nd floor on the left) can also be combined to make beds for the adults.  The green bed (top) only fits the kids but the matching beds from other sets stack with this one to make bunk beds.  The cake looks quite good (compared to a scary looking cake from an older grocery store set that we got used).  I love the teapot and the guitar. If an adult figure is sitting down, you can balance the guitar so it looks like they are playing. The baby fits on the rocking horse, which rocks.  My favourite part is the family.  The parents look super cool and my daughter thinks the baby is cute.  

This set is also great when combined with the white castle set in the Duplo Frozen line that has a ton of white pieces and some cool blue ice pieces.  Additionally or alternatively the Chinese New Year/Preschool set has a ton of white, red and brown pieces.  Either or both of these sets with the Modular House give many possibilities for making your own constructions while being able to keep some colour theme to the build.
